name: Zombie Runner (Aeon Colony Dev)
description:
This game was made by a group of people who are wanting to learn game development. As a teaching medium we decided to create a simple endless runner with different mechanics to most other endless runners. 

This has been made with a small group of children/young adults from the ages of 6 up to 13 years...

Only Android application available at the moment. 

Game instantly starts and once you have died, the game will restart - Work on the menu and HUD will be starting soon.
